entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Dalhousie

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
